detaileddescription.para: HAL LIN Hold Time

Minimum hold time for LIN transceiver transition request
Value is equal to 50 multiplyed by HAL_RTC_FREQ_MHZ
UINT32 Type

Used to save RTC value required for time tracking of short LIN activation in case of POR, see SWR_ICAS1_GW_23019.
range uint32 values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context HAL_LinTrcvGoToNormalAfterPOR, HAL_LinTrcvGoToSleepAfterPOR protection none storage class init ram
Get pointer to the "12-bit Fast SAR ADC B0".

This function is used to get pointer to the "12-bit Fast SAR ADC B0" (Sigma-Delta Analog-to-Digital Converter) peripheral.
N/A
N/A
void
&SAR_ADC_12BIT_B0
Globals
N/A
reentrant No context HAL_BASE - Board_AdcUnit_ReadChannelValue thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/A
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the returned pointer. TEST_Board_Peripheral_SAR_ADC_12BIT_B0 Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function needed by Board_AdcUnit_ReadChannelValue function.

Get pointer to the "SIUL1" (System Integration Unit Lite2) peripheral.
Get pointer to the "SIUL2" (System Integration Unit Lite2) peripheral.

This function is used to get pointer to the "SIUL2" (System Integration Unit Lite2) peripheral. The Buddy Deviceâ€”System Integration Unit Lite2 (BD_SIUL2) provides control over the electrical pads of the buddy device (BD), as well as implementing various SoC functions that are not included in other modules.
N/A
N/A
void
&SIUL2
Globals
N/A
reentrant No context task context HAL_BASE - Board_DigitalPort_SetValue HAL_BASE - Board_DigitalInput_GetValue thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous N/A
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check the returned pointer. TEST_Board_Peripheral_SIUL2 Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function needed by Board_DigitalPort_SetValue and Board_DigitalInput_GetValue functions. The Buddy Device-System Integration Unit Lite1 (BD_SIUL2) provides control over the electrical pads of the buddy device (BD), as well as implementing various SoC functions that are not included in other modules.

Check if ComChannel is CAN.

This function check if ComChannel is CAN by checking if the input communication channel is between communication channels dedicated for CAN.
N/A
N/A
channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
boolean
Globals
_ComChannelCanFirst [in] _ComChannelCanLast [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_BASE - HAL_ComChannel_SetNormalMode HAL_BASE - HAL_ComChannel_SetSleepMode HAL_BASE - ComChannel_IsCANOrLIN thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous These globals are used to check if the input communication channel is between communication channels dedicated for CAN.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function returns correctly that the input is a CAN or not. TEST_ComChannel_IsCAN Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function needed by all context functions.

Block the task for the defined delay in microsencods.

This function blocks the task for the defined delay in microsencods, using a counter that has a limit delay_us multiplied by HAL_RTC_FREQ_MHZ.
N/A
N/A
delay_us
- delay period in microseconds range uint32 resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_RTC_FREQ_MHZ [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_BASE - HAL_ComChannel_SetSleepMode HAL_VARIANT - Prepare_Ports_ForSleepMode HAL - HalusTimedelay thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_RTC_FREQ_MHZ is used in the counter, being multiplied by delay_us.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the task is blocked for the defined delay time. TEST_HAL_WaitBlocking_MicroSeconds Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper API to delay the execution for a short period of time.
Set CAN or LIN transceiver to normal mode.

This function check if the communication channel is mounted, if it is CAN or LIN and for each of them it set the pin to normal mode.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
Channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_CAN_NORMAL_MODE_STB_PIN_VALUE [in] HAL_LIN_NORMAL_MODE_NSLP_PIN_VALUE [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_VARIANT - Prepare_Ports_ForSleepMode ConfigNmLin - LinNmOnline DWA_LowPower - DWA_LowPower_Cyclic thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_CAN_NORMAL_MODE_STB_PIN_VALUE used to set pin to sleep mode (Level Low) HAL_LIN_NORMAL_MODE_NSLP_PIN_VALUE used to set pin to sleep mode (Level High)
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function set CAN or LIN transceiver to normal mode. TEST_HAL_ComChannel_SetNormalMode Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_18927
Set CAN or LIN transceiver to sleep mode.

This function check if the communication channel is CAN or LIN and for each of them it set the pin to sleep. After that it clear wakeup bit.
The task execution will be blocked for the delay_us microseconds.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
Channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
delay_us
- delay between setting the transceier to sleep and clearing the WKP range uint32 resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_CAN_SLEEP_MODE_STB_PIN_VALUE [in] HAL_LIN_SLEEP_MODE_NSLP_PIN_VALUE [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_VARIANT - Prepare_Ports_ForSleepMode ConfigNmLin - ApplNmLinBusSleep DWA_LowPower - DWA_LowPower_Cyclic
thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_CAN_SLEEP_MODE_STB_PIN_VALUE used to set pin to sleep mode (Level High) HAL_LIN_SLEEP_MODE_NSLP_PIN_VALUE used to set pin to sleep mode (Level Low)
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function set CAN or LIN transceiver to sleep mode. TEST_HAL_ComChannel_SetSleepMode Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_18926
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19870
Get the value of a GPIO pin.

This function check if the port is valid and then get the value of a GPIO pin.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
port
- digital port from HAL_active_config_set range HAL_DigitalPort_Type resolution N/A unit N/A
- PORT_PIN_LEVEL_LOW
PORT_PIN_LEVEL_HIGH
Globals
GPIO_INVALID [in]
reentrant No context task context HAL_VARIANT - HalWakeupOBDActive thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous GPIO_INVALID is used to check if the port is valid.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function return the value of a GPIO pin when the port is valid. TEST_HAL_DigitalPin_GetValue Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function to read a digital pin according to the HSI.

Get the raw value from an ADC port.

This function return the raw value from an ADC port.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet

adc_port

ADC raw value

HW_unit, ADC_channel [in]
reentrant No context No thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HW_unit, ADC_channel represents an ADC port and are used to have the index of the value in the ADC channel.

Check and clear new wakeup event.

This function checks if a CAN or LIN wakeup was detected by the HW wakeup unit for the coresponding Channel and clear the HW wakeup bit.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
Channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
- TRUE if wakeup was detected
FALSE if no wakeup was detected
Globals
HAL_active_config_set [in] wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN [in/out]
reentrant No context task context HAL - HalWakeupIs thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_active_config_set is used to active HAL config set depending on the HW version. wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN is part of configuration set of the ports used in the HAL module.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function clear the HW wakeup bit when a CAN or LIN wakeup was detected by the HW wakeup unit for the coresponding Channel. TEST_HAL_ComChannel_CheckAndClearWakeupBit Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19868
SWR_ICAS1_GW_19869
Wakeup a CAN or LIN channel from SW.

This function checks if the communication channel is CAN or LIN, it checks if a channel is mounted and then set new wakeup event.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
Channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_active_config_set [in] wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN [in/out]
reentrant No context No thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_active_config_set is used to active HAL config set depending on the HW version. wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN is part of configuration set of the ports used in the HAL module.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function set new wakeup event for CAN or LIN channel when CAN or LIN is mounted. TEST_HAL_ComChannel_SetWakeupBit Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function to set a simulate a CAN/LIN wakeup.
Clear the wakeup event from CAN or LIN channel.

This function checks if the communication channel is CAN or LIN, it checks if a channel is mounted and then clear the wakeup event from CAN or LIN channel.
To be called after HAL_SetActiveConfigSet
N/A
Channel
- CAN or LIN channel range TComChannel resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
HAL_active_config_set [in] wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN [in/out]
reentrant No context No thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No synchronous HAL_active_config_set is used to active HAL config set depending on the HW version. wakeup_bit_CAN_LIN is part of configuration set of the ports used in the HAL module.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function clear the wakeup event from CAN or LIN channel when CAN or LIN is mounted. TEST_HAL_ComChannel_ClearWakeupBit Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helper function clear the wakeup event from CAN/LIN.
Service to activate all available LIN transceivers if booting from POR.

This function checks if the boot is from POR and sets all available LIN transceivers to normal (activate).
shall be called after PostBuildHandler_McalInit
N/A
void
void
Globals
MC_RGM_DES_POR_MASK [in] _ComChannelLinFirst [in] HAL_RTCValLINActStartPoint [out]
reentrant No context No thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module, but no need for protection since is called in startup phase multicore safe No, but not applicable since called from startup phase synchronous MC_RGM_DES_POR_MASK - MC_RGM Memory Map for POR. _ComChannelLinFirst - needed to use the communication channel for LIN. HAL_RTCValLINActStartPoint - Used to save RTC value required for time tracking of short LIN activation in case of POR.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if all available LIN transceivers are activated in case of booting from POR. TEST_HAL_LinTrcvGoToNormalAfterPOR Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_23019
Service to quit the short activation time after POR of all available LIN transceivers.

This function checks if the boot is from POR and quit the short activation time after POR of all available LIN transceivers.
shall be called after HAL_LinTrcvGoToNormalAfterPOR
N/A
void
N/A
Globals
MC_RGM_DES_POR_MASK [in] HAL_LIN_TRCV_HOLD_TIME_50US [in] _ComChannelLinFirst, _ComChannelLinLast [in] HAL_RTCValLINActStartPoint [in]
reentrant No context task context EcuM startup before OS activation (EcuM_AL_DriverInitOne) thread safe No - Integration must insure that that function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module, but no need for protection since is called in startup phase multicore safe No, but not applicable since called from startup phase synchronous MC_RGM_DES_POR_MASK - MC_RGM Memory Map for POR. HAL_LIN_TRCV_HOLD_TIME_50US - Minimum hold time for LIN transceiver transition request. _ComChannelLinFirst, _ComChannelLinLast - needed to use the communication channel for LIN. HAL_RTCValLINActStartPoint - Used to save RTC value required for time tracking of short LIN activation in case of POR.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on: Test case shall be created to check if the function quit the short activation time after POR of all available LIN transceivers. TEST_HAL_LinTrcvGoToSleepAfterPOR Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_23019

briefdescription.para: Contains the implementation of the functions used as basis for other modules.

detaileddescription.para: The implementation is based on the active configuration.
